DOC.brief_summary: This trial is conducted in Europe. Growth Hormone in young adults with growth hormone deficiency in childhood. This trial compares a treated group of patients with an untreated group of patients.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Growth Hormone on Bone Mineral Density in Young Adults With Child-hood Onset Growth Hormone Deficiency
DOC.criteria: Childhood onset growth hormone deficiency Subjects received growth hormone replacement therapy during prepuberty and puberty GH treatment during the month preceding randomisation Treatment within the previous 6 months with medication that may affect bone mineral density Diseases which may affect bone metabolism
